casebody.data:
The PEOPLE, etc., Respondent,
v.
Omar ALVAREZ, Appellant. Motion No: 2018-252 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided March 22, 2018

Motion for assignment of counsel granted and Christina A. Swarns, Office of the Appellate Defender, 11 Park Place, Suite 1601, New York, NY 10007 assigned as **160counsel to the appellant on the appeal herein.
